footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Diona | Update Date: 10/26/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Warbow__ - Allows her to function as a battery for non-Cryo units as well.
__Sacrificial Bow__ - Superior to Fav Bow when additional Cryo Particles are preferred

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Elegy for the End__ - Hard to maintain uptime
__Recurve Bow__ - Marginal increase while  creating hard to meet ER requirements

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Icy Paws
**2)** Elemental Burst: Signature Mix
**3)** Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style (Not recommended)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Use whatever artifacts are at hand, do not specifically farm for her.
